article.title: CACI Supports Defense Department Comptroller IT
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: CACI Inc. - Federal, Chantilly, Va., is being awarded a $10,557,263 modification to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price contract for on-site operational support to the mission systems of the office of the undersecretary of defense (comptroller) in the areas relating to system maintenance, system conversion and migration, report generation and documentation, training and guidance on the comptroller mission systems as well as service desk and network operations. This contract supports the department's IT consolidation efficiency initiative. This is the third option of a five-year contract period. Defense Finance and Accounting Service, Contract Services Directorate is the contracting activity.
